pullRequest.title: [VPC/Route/Subnet manger] Add service layer, Ignite support and UTs
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR provides the following new features to Vpc/Route/Subnet/IP managers:

Ignite support in Subnet Manager
CIDR block verification module
Add yaml files of Ignites and IP Manager
Add new service layer to VPC/Route manager
Verify Subnet manager integration with IP manager
New UTs for VPC manager, Route manager and Subnet manager

nodes.bodyText: getAllAddress could be very costly for a huge subnet. Could we do it more efficient?
Can we have a UT covering bad CIDR block case?

commit.message: Add new subnet UTs and verify cidr block module

nodes.bodyText: To be accurate, let us use "allocateIpAddressForGatewayPort"
Also inside this method, I believe we have two standalone logics. One is to allocate Ip range for subnet, and the other is to allocate ip address for gateway port. Let us split them into two methods.
